message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I think $15,000 is the highest I can go. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  To find a middle ground, I'd be willing to come down to $18,000.  I believe this reflects the true value of the product.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $14,000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchasing the product at this price.
